text: #MukeshAmbani urges the employees of #Reliance to accelerate #AI transformation across all businesses in 2024 as the oil-to-retail conglomerate seeks to stay ahead of rivals in deploying advanced technologies.   https://english.alarabiya.net/business/economy/2023/12/28/Ambani-targets-completing-Reliance-s-AI-transformation-in-2024
